World of Warcraft: Die Perle von Pandaria
Danach: Uber die Zeit Nach Einer Trennung

description:
Stories include:

"Tarzan: Inferno";

"Korak: Last Laugh" (part 1);

"Tarzan: Jungle Quest" (part 2); and

"Tarzan: Striped Fury".
name: No. 16

volume.name: Marvel Graphic Novel: Avengers von Bendis & Dell'otto
Marvel Graphic Novel: X-Force: Sex & Violence

description:
Larry B. Max is an unusual specialist from a little-known branch of the I.R.S. (Internal Revenue Service), the all-powerful tax-collecting agency of the United States, which has every technological method at his disposal to link high finance and high crime.

Max unravels the financial and logistical organisations which supports a huge drugs operation between Mexico and the US. In the process, though, the lines between legality and providing jobs for thousands of people, between prosperity and morals become blurred.

This two-volume book includes “Narcocracy.”

The two volumes were published in the original French by Le Lombard on May 12, 2001 ("Blue Ice") and August 24, 2002 ("Narcocratie").
name: Blue Ice

description:
Larry B. Max is an unusual specialist from a little-known branch of the I.R.S. (Internal Revenue Service), the all-powerful tax-collecting agency of the United States, which has every technological method at its disposal to investigate possible links between high finance and high crime.

Max investigates two seemingly-unconnected murders. The former president of an Asian country, who was accused of embezzlement, is bumped off in France. Meanwhile, the right-hand man of a corrupt US mayor meets a grizzly end in the Californian desert. Max finds a strange message stating “Silicia, 10 am, Ocean Drive” and tries to figure out what it all means. Meanwhile, a mysterious young lady seems to be one step ahead of him and erasing one clue after the other.
name: Sicilia, Inc.

description:
Encounter with The Glabrour

The Green Emperor is bedridden. Feeling death is near and having no male heir, he sends for one of his brother's sons. The king must now choose which son to send, as the journey alone will be treacherous enough.

The story of Miron

Is the story of birth and childhood of Miron also known as Gerilă. His father is the human blacksmith Daidur and his mother the frost giant Keraglacia.
name: Întâlnirea cu Spânul

description:
Larry B. Max is an unusual specialist from a little-known branch of the I.R.S. (Internal Revenue Service), the all-powerful tax-collecting agency of the United States, with every technological method at his disposal to link high finance and high crime.

Max investigates Silicia, Inc., a mysterious company fronting the activities of a beautiful and deadly assassin. For $2.5 million per contract, the killer leaves a trail of bodies and corruption behind her. As the I.R.$. agent closes in on his target, the scale of her web becomes frighteningly clear–and things take an unpleasantly personal turn for Max.
name: The Corrupter

description:
First adventures

Spânul and Harap Alb make their way to the castle of The Green Emperor. Spânul is presented as the nephew of the Emperor and Harap Alb as his servent. Harap Alb must endure a number of challenges in the name of Spânul but gets help from Nedelia (Holy Sunday).

The story of Lardea

We find out the origins of the character Lardea. His mother is the dwarf Ketra who fall in love for the wizard Thanos.

Once with the frost

Is a story about Miron and his life as a mercenary.
name: Primele Aventuri

description:
Among friends

The adventures of Harap Alb continues, he's making new friends on his way to The Red Emperor (Ziraxes) castle. He needs to bring with him the daughter of The Red Emperor, Mara to his master Spânul but the emperor won't let go easy his daughter.

The story of Mîrza

We find out about the origins of the character

Mîrza. His mother is the Queen of waters named Zura and his father is the King Seuthes.

The legend of Dragobete

In this story Lardea is involved in the creation of the legend of Dragobete for his benefit of course!
name: Între Prieteni

description:
The Lizard is back, and this time, Spider-Man is going to put him down once and for all! Plus, can Spidey trust Morbius, the Living Vampire?

By Dan Slott and Guiseppe Camuncoli.

Also: Spider-Man and the symbiote task force confront Carnage!

By Zeb Wells and Clayton Crain.
name: Revenge of the Reptile

description: An experimental weather machine, a transport ship filled with hundreds of families and a troop of hired killers converge on a derelict colony world only to discover it's not abandoned. Lauren Moore is a brilliant young scientist and the creator of Cloudburst: a massive satellite designed to control rainfall on dry planets. Onboard a new colony ship carrying several hundred families, soldiers and cryogenically stored animal embryos, Lauren has been commissioned to use Cloudburst to terraform the planet. What Lauren doesn't know is the soldiers escorting the ship have been sent to remove the existing colonists to make room for the new ones. The corporate term is eviction. The human term is mass murder. The only man who can help her is a mysterious drifter who some say is only a myth, an invention of desert nomads and lunatics.
name: OGN

description: The Saga continues... With the discovery of hundreds of dead clock- workers beneath the gears, Hans and Astrid begin a search for the killer and a threat to not only themselves but to the clockworks and the gates to heaven. Featuring a dramatic revelation regarding the Five O'Clock Shadow and its relationship to the Time Flies and Hans' first major battle with the devil! Special back-up features Phil Hester's original Clock Maker character designs!
name: Chapters Five through Eight

description:
Prophecies are in play, and destiny seems to have the Allgoods locked in its crosshairs!

The One Who Is The One is convinced that Wisty holds the key to unparalleled power, that she is “The One Who Has The Gift,” and will stop at nothing to possess that power for himself. The New Order’s tactics for crushing the Resistance have reached a fever pitch, and Whit and Wisty’s luck seems to be running out. With their lives hanging in the balance, the Allgoods’ chances of survival hinge on trusting the less-than-trustworthy Byron Swain. But in the end, where does his true allegiance lie…?

Chapter 11-20.
name: Vol. 2

description: Raspe's fantastical tales of Baron Munchausen as he tames wolves, journeys to the moon, gets fired from a cannon and more!
name: Adventures of Baron Munchausen
Journey To The Center Of The Earth

description:
Before the Ice Age, there was the lost continent of Hyperborea, a jungle world of cruelty and beauty. This comic adaptation of the short story "The Tale of Satampra Zeiros" is a tribute to the work of Clark Ashton Smith (1893-1961), the California-based creator of the dark god Tsathogghua, ancient Hyperborea, the far-future world of Zothique and many other creations which have entered the vocabulary of science fiction and horror.

Smith's work is like a cross between Lovecraft, Poe and Robert E. Howard: pulpy fantasy action stories, poetically described, which nevertheless have an everpresent element of horror and cynicism. Smith is one of the greatest pre-Tolkien fantasy writers. In addition to a 20-page comic by Jason Thompson, it contains a map of Hyperborea and additional drawings by tattooist Adam Burns.
name: "The Tale of Satampra Zeiros"

volume.name: Judge Dredd: The Judge Child Quest
Judge Dredd in Tale of the Dead Man

description:
End of beginnings

Harap Alb and his friends must overcome the last test of The Red Emperor in order to gain the hand of his daughter Mara. Once back on the castle of The Green Emperor Harap Alb must face Spânul in an heroic battle to gain the throne of Amanthia and the hand of Mara.

The story of Haiganu

In this story we find out the origins of Haiganu. Haiganu and his father Gebeleizis face in battle the god of war Pleistoros.
name: Sfârșit de Începuturi

description:
A legendary team of heroes forger by fate and dedicated to protecting the innocent against threats too great for any single champion to face. They are the Avengers... Earth's Mightiest Heroes.


Discover the truth behind the legends...

Meet scientist extraordinaire Hank Pym and beautiful socialite Janet Van Dyne, as tragedy draws them together and they become the diminutive duo of Ant-Man and Wasp.

Witness the creation of the Vision, the worlds first synthezoid and the ultimate weapon of the insane robot Ultron, and his first encounter with the Avengers.

Follow wrongly convicted criminal Luke Cage, as a chance at early parole results in a freak accident and a lifelong path to redemption.

Encounter the mutant twins Scarlet Witch and Quicksilver as they are persecuted by those who hate and fear them, before joining the mutant terrorist Magneto. But what events will lead brother and sister to try and redeem themselves and join the ranks of Earth's Mightiest Heroes?

Join Thor in Asgard as his rivalry with his adopted brother Loki, and his desire to live up to and exceed his father's expectations, takes him on a journey towards humility and compassion that is also his path to godhood and worthiness.

Collects:
Avengers Origins: Ant-Man & Wasp

Avengers Origins: Vision

Avengers Origins: Luke Cage

Avengers Origins: Scarlet Witch & Quicksilver

Avengers Origins: Thor
name: Avengers Origins

volume.name: Robotech: Crystal World - Prisoners of Spheris
